1502350.name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts - Wallpaper Pack
1502350.description:
With this DLC you can grab a couple of wallpapers associated with the game Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts in which you can play as a paid assassin - a hit man for hire, and need to beware of rival snipers who won’t hesitate to disrupt your best-laid plans. Download wallpaper pack and choose between the 4K and HD. Become even more immersed with the game by downloading free wallpapers and feel like the ultimate assassin in the most realistic modern warfare.

Once downloaded, wallpapers are available inside the main game folder:
SteamLibrary/steamapps/common/Sniper Ghost Warrior Contacts/Wallpapers
1502350.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 捷克语, 韩语, 日语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
